RoomDescription: A rusty track leads into the main chamber, obviously disused for some time. The ore cart is nowhere to be seen, probably scavanged for metal when the mine was closed.[n][n]The walls of the chamber are uneven from the extraction but it seems that the miners were only interested in the larger iron veins.

Prerequisites.AdditionalData: Two Rings Don't Make A Right
Two Rings Don't Make A Right

ItemSpawns.SpawnMessage: Some wall crumbles and exposes a gleaming Iron Vein
